title: {websiteName} Terms of Service
subtitle: Governing your exploration of our historical and archaeological data platform
content: By accessing {websiteName}, you agree to these Terms of Service, which govern your use of our platform dedicated to historical and archaeological data and resources.
These terms ensure a respectful and secure experience for all users, supporting access to curated historical content and interactive tools.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using {websiteName}, you agree to comply with these terms, including adherence to our policies for accessing and sharing historical and archaeological data.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining accurate account information, respecting intellectual property rights, and using {websiteName}â€™s resources for lawful and educational purposes.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: {websiteName} is not liable for losses from unauthorized access or misuse, provided we maintain industry-standard security measures for data protection.

sections.title: Content Usage Agreements
sections.content: All content accessed on {websiteName}, including historical data and archaeological resources, is subject to usage agreements ensuring proper attribution and compliance.
